description:
"The Walking Dead" fans might be getting a lot more Norman Reedus in the second half of Season 4. According to a new report, Daryl Dixon will get at least one -- and maybe two -- episodes that focus almost exclusively on him.《行尸走肉》第四季后半段将会有更多Norman Reedus戏份。最新消息，Daryl Dixon将会有至少一集——或许是两集——弩哥特别集。

Meanwhile, ComicBook.com claims to have more details about Carol's return. She will apparently meet up with Tyreese, who is on the run with Lizzie, Mika and the rest of the kids.与此同时，ComicBook网站报道了更多关于Carol回归的细节。她将会与Tyreese相遇，Tyreese和Lizzie、Mika和其他孩子们一起出逃。

Finally, the site believes to have discovered that another character who will die before the end of Season 4. ComicBook.com says that "one of the main cast members who has not been killed in the comic book series will die during Season 4." Again, not confirmed, but that claim narrows down the possibilities a lot. 最后，该网站认为第四季结束前还会有一个角色死掉。ComicBook.com表示“这是剧中的主要角色，而且这个角色在原著漫画中仍然没有被杀掉，不过会在剧集中死掉”。不过这个消息还未得到确定，不过可能性很大。

title: 《行尸走肉》光头女和锤男仇人相遇
